title: Ticket #1945: flocking does not advance due to inactivity
description: When a negotiator in the flocking list does not successfully negotiate with the schedd, the schedd is supposed to eventually increment the flocking level. However, as of 7.5.5, contact from any negotiator was resetting the timer, so this was defeating the algorithm.
check_ins:
2011-Mar-02 17:15   Check-in [25945]: Documented fix for advancing flocking level due to lack of negotiation activyt. #1945 (By Dan Bradley )
2011-Mar-02 16:42   Check-in [20891]: Fix incrementing of flocking level when there is no activity from negotiator. #1945 (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
